name: Medice To Arms
description:
Welcome to Medice To Arms, a place where doctors battle to the death with their own creations. Arrange organs in your creature’s body to strategically avoid deadly blasts from your opponent. These organs, however, contribute to your creature’s health, attack and special abilities, so choose wisely! Whoever destroys three organs first is declared the winner in an epic battle of the flesh! Strategize, Arrange, Battle. This is Medice To Arms.

Main Features

  • Customize your creature's colour and face
  • Real-time 1v1 combat either with a friend or online matchmaking
  • Customize your organ layout for your play-style
  • Climb the leaderboard by having the most wins
  • Unlock new faces by earning wins




  • Go on the offensive by adding offensive organs
  • Play a more defensive game with passive organs
